<!-- wp:jet-forms/calculated-field {"value_type":"string","calc_formula":"\u0022%floor_type%\u0022==\u0022Vinyl Plank\u0022 ? %sf%*3.5 : \u0022%floor_type%\u0022==\u0022Engineered Hardwood\u0022 ? %sf%*6.5 : \u0022%floor_type%\u0022==\u0022Traditional Hardwood\u0022 ? %sf%*8.5 : 0","calc_hidden":true,"label":"Labor Cost","name":"labor_cost"} /-->

<!-- wp:jet-forms/calculated-field {"value_type":"string","calc_formula":"\u0022%refinish_or_install%\u0022==\u0022install\u0022 ? (\u0022%floor_type%\u0022==\u0022Vinyl Plank\u0022 ? %sf%*3.5 : \u0022%floor_type%\u0022==\u0022Engineered Hardwood\u0022 ? %sf%*4.5 : \u0022%floor_type%\u0022==\u0022Traditional Hardwood\u0022 ? %sf%*8.5 : 0) : 0","calc_hidden":true,"label":"Material Cost","name":"material_cost"} /-->

<!-- wp:jet-forms/calculated-field {"value_type":"string","calc_formula":"\u0022%demolition%\u0022==\u0022yes\u0022 ? %sf%*1.35 : 0","calc_hidden":true,"label":"Demolition Cost","name":"demolition_cost"} /-->

<!-- wp:jet-forms/calculated-field {"calc_formula":"%labor_cost%+%material_cost%+%demolition_cost%","calc_hidden":true,"label":"Subtotal","name":"subtotal"} /-->
